aircraft.value: Pegasus Swift - AC-2356-502 at Sector North Station

defect_observed.value: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 24/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 25/07/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 26/07/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 28/07/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 29/07/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
